value.0: Wizards living and working in the Empire are required by law to hold a license to practice their art. That license can be inspected at any time by any Imperial offical, including Witchunters, so it must be carried at all times. Licenses can only be issued to a Wizard if they prove themselves trustworthy and secure the sponsorship of another already-licensed Wizard. Fees for Licensing vary from town to town but are generally quite steep. A license can be revoked at a moments notice for flagrant misuse of magic at an inappropriate time or place.
